intro: Phlomoides likiangensis, commonly known as the Yunnan phlomoides, is a flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Lamiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs and shrubs. The plant is characterized by its slender stems and small, often hairy leaves. Its flowers are typically pale blue or purple and are arranged in whorled clusters. It is often found in grassy areas and open woodlands, thriving in temperate climates.
